'''Cheese and Dew Teatime''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

==How to Obtain==
Cheese and Dew Teatime could be obtained through the following collaborations by purchasing specific items:
* [[Genshin Impact × HEYTEA]]: Mainland China
* [[Genshin Impact × LiHO TEA]]: Malaysia, Singapore
* [[Genshin Impact × Laika Café, Đen Đá Coffee]]: Vietnam
* [[Genshin Impact × KOI Thé]]: Thailand
* [[Genshin Impact × COMEBUY]]: Taiwan, Hong Kong SAR
* [[Genshin Impact × Gong cha]]: Philippines
* [[Genshin Impact × HopHop]]: Indonesia
* [[Genshin Impact × Happy Lemon]]: U.S.
